questions: Define the following terms :  Current fallow land  Other than current fallow  Culturable waste land
answers: Current fallow land : Left uncultivation for one or less than one agricultural year.  Other than current fallow : Left uncultivated for past 1 to 5 agricultural years.  Cultural waste land : Left uncultivated for more than 5 agricultural years.

questions: Mention any two human activities which are responsible for the process of soil erosion. Explain the two types of soil erosion mostly observed in India ?
answers: Two human activities which are responsible for the process of soil erosion are deforestation and overgrazing, mining, construction, etc.   Types of Soil Erosion :  Gullies : The running water cuts through the clayey soil and makes deep channels/gullies.
